name: Dragon Reach AlphaBetaDeltaThelta
description:
Can you reach the dragon,

this is simply your joining of the journey, welcome and thank you. 

you must Reach the Dragon. you have found yourself near Delvendor Castle, you were on a search for the Crystals of Might. you have found nothing, but you must now face your greatest opponent, yourself. in your failed search for crystals you activated an ancient magical. this has manifested itself in the form of an evil clone, and this clone knight will not let you pass. 

make your way to the castle and Jump on the dragons back to GTFO

this is Version 0.1, it is what it is, for now, 




more to come and donate some doge  :)

Feedback and doge apprichaited
